entry.title: Monday: Clearing. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Clearing this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming north 30 near noon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 13 February 2023
